translation: There is no knowledge of the Self for the unsteady, and no meditation is possible for the unsteady, and no peace for the unmeditative, and how can there be happiness for one who has no peace?
commentary: 2.66 Not not? Is there is? Buddhi: knowledge (of the Self)? of the unsteady? Not not? f and? of the unsteady? Emotion meditation? Not not? f and? abhavayatah of the unmeditated? Peace: peace? of the peaceless of the peaceless? Where whence? sukham happiness.Commentary The man who cannot fix his mind in meditation cannot have knowledge of the Self.
